  <abstract>Level 1 (Provinces) of Pakistan (Country wide coverage)

Create a country wide administrative boundary dataset based on PCO (Population Census Organisation) data.

This dataset fits to GAUL (Global Administrative Unit Layer) level 0 boundaries and holds the PCO (Population Census Organisation) administrative boundaries, level 1</abstract>
